name: DASH_KILL
description:
My submission to the miniJam #97!

Simulate killing some targets by dashing towards them, be careful not to move too much though, as energy is finite.

The weekend ended up being a lot more busy than planned so the game is quite incomplete, it has all main mechanics (and a bug sometimes on the dash mechanic) and is very lackluster visual and audio wise, still done is better than perfect.
